original_title: Songs for Tsunami Relief: Austin to South Asia
overview: In Austin, Texas, tsunami relief took the form of a benefit concert. The legendary Willie Nelson and a cast of the city's finest musicians turned raising money for a tragic disaster into a celebration of life and music. Money made its way from Austin to South Asia. That effort continues with this DVD. Now you too can experience a powerful evening of music, while lending a still valuable helping hand. What would Willie do? Exactly this.
tagline: A Rare Gathering of Texas Legends Giving Their Best!
title: Songs for Tsunami Relief: Austin to South Asia
